{
    "quotes": "single",
    "indent": "\t",
    "maxEmptyLines": 10
}
---
module.exports = [


    {
        files: ["nitpik.config.js"],
        formatter: new JavaScriptFormatter({
            style: {
                quotes: "single",
                indent: "\t"
            }
        })
    }


];
---
module.exports = [

	{
		files: ['nitpik.config.js'],
		formatter: new JavaScriptFormatter({
			style: {
				quotes: 'single',
				indent: '\t'	
			}
		})
	}

];
